title: Knowledge Domain
content:
herited Cleric Features

Wisdom Saving Throw Proficiency Charisma Saving Throw Proficiency Light Armour Proficiency Medium Armour Proficiency Shield Proficiency Simple Weapon Proficiency Morningstar Proficiency Choose 2 Skill Proficiencies Spellcasting Domain Spells

Knowledge Domain is a Subclass of Cleric in Baldur's Gate 3. Clerics' primary ability is Wisdom, their saving throw proficiencies are Wisdom, Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8 per Cleric level. They have proficiency with All
